StaticGlutamateSynapse Class Reference

#include <staticglutamatesynapse.h>

Inheritance diagram for StaticGlutamateSynapse:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A Glutamate synapse with no synaptic short time dynamics, i.e. no depression and no facilitation.
